jd_information.description: Brief job profile • Develop content for social networks and all the online platforms in theform of stories, write ups, posts, tweets, punch lines, captions etc• Develop content for SMS & Blog based on current campaigns and/or variousother topics• Write SEO content• Edit and proof read content corresponding to digital media• Research on various topics that will be assigned for content creation• Reply to everyday queries/comments posted on social media (incoordination with the concerned team)• Post content on social media platforms• Manage interaction and engagement on the social media handles incoordination with the team on daily basis Required education /experience:• Bachelors in journalism/ communications• Certificate in writing/creative courses would be an added advantage• A minimum of one year experience in content development• Some experience of handling social media is preferred
